attributes.action: compel Local Authorities and Housing Associations to remove wasp nests,when discovered in property, free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wasps are an extremely dangerous insect,and their painful sting is frequently fatal to humans. Home occupiers should not be obliged to deal with any nest they find in or on their property, and should not be required by Local Authorities or Landlords to finance the removal of same.
